thread.title: Wonderful night in the village
thread.title_full: Wonderful night in the village - Review of Walker Hotel Greenwich Village, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: stephaniew490
title: Wonderful night in the village
text: This beautiful boutique hotel in a quiet area in Greenwich village was a great find! The rooms were comfortable and clean with an upscale bathroom boasting luxury towels and excellent water pressure. I had breakfast at the hotel restaurant and was greeted with friendly and helpful wait staff that made sure my special dietary needs were met. The food was delicious and served expediently. Highly recommended.
